meanings.definition: A tree of the genus Pseudopanax, native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The lancewoods in the forest provide shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful lancewoods tree while hiking in New Zealand.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the lancewoods branches to play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The lancewoods stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The lancewoods swayed gracefully in the wind, their leaves rustling softly.

meanings.definition: The wood of this tree, used for making furniture and tools.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a sturdy table from lancewoods.
meanings.sent2: The handle of the hammer was carved from lancewoods.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns in the lancewoods woodpile.
meanings.sent4: The lancewoods wood gleamed like polished mahogany.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly cut lancewoods filled the workshop with a pleasant aroma.
